alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 2:58PM CST until January 15 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Dawes County, Box Butte County, Northern Sioux County and Southern Sioux County. In Wyoming, Niobrara County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Friday to 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
